Databricks¶

Reads data from Databricks.

Signals¶

  • (None)

Outputs:

  • Data: dataset from Databricks

Description¶

The Databricks widget accesses data stored in Databricks.

You will need to supply the following settings in order to connect and query your Databricks instance.

  1. Host

  2. HTTP Path

  3. Token

  4. Catalog

  5. Schema

  6. Query
